abstract.shortdesc: In this lesson, you will learn the finer points of serving a prepared PB&J meal.

taskbody.context:
Now that your food is prepared, you face the moment of truth when you place your masterpiece in front of hungry, yet critical, palates. Proper placement and presentation of your prepared food will make all the difference.
To serve the PB&J meal to your patrons:

step.cmd: Place the bag of chips and the bowl of salsa in the center of the table.
Place a plate in front of each person. On each plate, make sure you add the following items:
Place a glass of milk above and to the right of each plate.

taskbody.result: Your meal is now complete and ready to be enjoyed by your patrons. Don't forget to gather feedback for future meals. If feedback is not freely offered, feel free to casually solicit comments.

ul.li: You learned how to serve the meal to your patrons.
